title: Internal Tool to Revenue Line Transformation
summary: Productizing internal AI capabilities (Route Optimization, GoLocal) as external revenue streams through SaaS offerings

content.whatItIs: Walmart's strategic evolution encapsulates the 'Platform-to-Product' model: identifying internal operational capabilities and commercializing them as external revenue streams.
howItWorks: Route Optimization began as internal logistics AI to reduce emissions and improve trailer packing
Results: 94 million pounds of CO2 avoided, 30 million unnecessary miles eliminated, 110,000 inefficient paths optimized
Won the 2023 Franz Edelman Award for operational excellence
Recognizing the value extended beyond internal cost savings, Walmart commercialized Route Optimization as SaaS through Walmart Commerce Technologies
GoLocal (2021): white-label parcel delivery service extends Walmart's last-mile infrastructure to other retailers
content.coreInsight: Any internal capability that provides significant operational advantage is a potential product. The question isn't 'should we build this?' but 'who else would pay for this?' Internal tools become moats when competitors must either build or buy from you.
content.keyMetrics: Corporate identity shift: 'We're now an advertising business, a data company, a financial services provider, and a Software as a Service (SaaS) provider, and more.'
